snippet: Mikel Landa of Spain raced ahead to climb the final ascent alone and win the 11th stage of the Vuelta a España, and Fabio Aru of Italy finished second to claim the overall leader’s jersey.
abstract: Mikel Landa wins 11th stage of Vuelta a Espana; Fabio Aru comes in second to take overall lead in race.
lead_paragraph: Mikel Landa of Spain raced ahead to climb the final ascent alone and win the 11th stage of the Vuelta a España, and Fabio Aru of Italy finished second to claim the overall leader’s jersey.

headline.print_headline: Italian Takes Vuelta Lead; Spaniard Wins Stage
